General.Name: Surana Solar Limited
General.Description: Surana Solar Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of solar panels and solar photovoltaic (PV) modules in India and internationally. It operates through Solar Products and Wind Power segments. The company generates wind and solar power; and trades in solar PV modules and other solar related products. It also provides engineering, procurement, and construction services for power projects on turnkey basis. Further, the company offers solar lighting products, including home lighting systems and solar street lighting products. It sells its products under the Surana Solar brand. The company was formerly known as Surana Ventures Limited. Surana Solar Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

0.Name: Mr. Manish  Surana
